content: a simple pattern for the tbh creature / yippee meme there are two versions the normal version about 10 cm from head to toe and a smaller version about 8 cm from head to toe this pattern only works with single crochets the pattern is only available in english us terms materials needed * white yarn * black yarn * crochet hook 4-4 5 mm * sewing needle * stuffing material * safety eyes normal version 18 mm small version 15 mm please do not reshare this pattern or claim it as your own
